snippet: A working-class city in Russia embodies support for Prime Minister Vladimir V. Putin, though it seems to be based mostly on an absence of options.
abstract: Nizhny Tagil, a gritty, industrial city in eastern Russia, has come to embody the base of support by the country's working class for Prime Minister Vladimir V Putin in the upcoming presidential election; many residents, however, say their enthusiasm for Putin has faded, and are willing to choose him only because there are no alternatives.
lead_paragraph: A working-class city in Russia embodies support for Prime Minister Vladimir V. Putin, though it seems to be based mostly on an absence of options.

headline.seo: Putin Support Tepid but Broad in Industrial Russia
headline.main: In Area Embodying Putin Base, Dispirited City Voices Tepid Support
headline.print_headline: In Area Embodying Putin Base, Dispirited City Voices Tepid Support
